title: What is an example of naturalism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Naturalism is type of art depicting objects as they actually seen in Nature. It is many times interchanged with Realism. I take this space to place Naturalism exclusively with Nature and with in the realm of its elements and omit human beings. (as they don’t deserve to be part of it.. Everything about them is artificial and their main aim is to thrive like worms and feed on woods and it’s natural resources without any regards for Nature) One of greatest of Kannada Poet Kuvempu who is known for his ‘ Vishvamanava ‘ - The Man of the World - concept says to a temple priest about picking flowers and adorning the God with it ‘ God did not ask for you to pluck it from the plant and place it on head or make a garland from it, What rights do you have to pluck it from a plant you can’t create it’. Right now I am sending few of my works. Not really purely Naturalistic but one which has Natural elements taken some liberty with it as I feel ‘ pure imitation’ is not considered as greatest of arts.    Realism one can associate with General things as they seen in living space ; humans their condition; work, constructions buildings .. industries machinery, culture and tradition ..
